turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey Lisa.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hey boss. What's up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Needing me some Starbucks...

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Copy that. Which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Downtown Springfield, or somewhere on the west side would also be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it.  Know what you want sir?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm undecided.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well you know, I'm a sucker for the Cinnamon Dolce Latte.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I don't like Cinammon. In. My. Coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. What about a Mocha?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Maybe. Throw something at me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Black and White, Caffe, Cherry, or...?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm actually thinking lighter this morning.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Back on your diet?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Not really. Just not wanting to load up on coffee, if I decide to eat danish.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Gotcha. So what are you thinking then?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm actually thinking a Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, how about a Chestnut Praline Latte?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, I am in the mood for the Caramel Brulee Latte. Large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. Will be available at the James River West Campus drive thru in 15 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great! Thanks. See you at the office in about a half.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ciao.

items.name: Black and White, Caffe, Cherry, or...?
I'm actually thinking lighter this morning
